GSD.description:
iommu: Fix potential use-after-free during probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.101 by commit cb86e511e78e796de6947b8f3acca1b7c76fb2ff. For more details please see the references link.
